name: Neutral
description: Neutral was made in the Australian global game jam a 48-hour event. The game was developed by myself. Music was sourced from Kai Engel https://www.kai-engel.com/. The objective of the game is to reach the end portal however you can only touch the opposite colour to yours. But there is a neutral colour of grey allowing both characters on at once. Enjoy this puzzle-filled game and feel free to leave any comments.
